OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

returns.marketAddress: Address of the newly created market

getAllMarkets().details: Warning: May be expensive for large numbers of markets

returns._0: markets Array of all market addresses

params.limit: Maximum number of markets to return

returns._0: valid True if the address is a valid market

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.creator: Address that will deploy the market

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

getMarketInfo(address).notice: Get market info for a specific market

getMarkets(uint256,uint256).notice: Get paginated list of all markets

getMarketsByCreator(address).notice: Get all markets by a specific creator

getTotalMarkets().notice: Get the total number of markets

isValidMarket(address).notice: Check if an address is a valid market created by this factory

predictAddress(address,string,uint256,ad.notice: Predict the address of a market before deployment

userdoc.notice: Factory contract for creating Sidebet markets using CREATE2
